question: I am the sitting governor of Louisiana. My given first name is Piyush, but you can call me:
I am the former governor of Maryland. I signed laws making some undocumented immigrants eligible for in-state tuition and legalizing gay marriage. My name is:
I’m Rhode Island’s governor. So was my dad. I used to be the Senate’s most liberal Republican. Then I became an independent. Now I’m running as a Democrat. I am:
